contents: Thank you for contacting RH Electronics about _____(11)_____. We would be happy to provide an estimate for interactive whiteboards. Most schools _____(12)_____ experience with interactive whiteboards. They can greatly enhance the educational experience, but implementing this new technology can be challenging. Several large companies provide interactive whiteboards, and most of these products use proprietary software. We can help you compare the available _____(13)_____ the product that best suits your needs.
